document_data.name: Gronag
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gronag''' was a [[goblin]] [[warrior]] devotee of [[the Absolute]] who traversed the [[shadow-cursed lands]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Hey boy - yeh want the bone? Yeh want the bone?|Gronag}}
document_data.Description: Gronag was a male goblin with facial pain across his left eye, dark-yellow hide, a mohawk, and crudely-cobbled together goblin metal armor and a [[scimitar]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Gronag joined the new "deity" that emerged in the [[Western Heartlands]] â€“ the Absolute. The goblin joined the cult's army in the shadow-cursed lands around the [[Moonrise Towers]] and was tasked, along with a group of other cultists that included [[Kansif]], [[Vez]], and [[Bedi]], with manning a checkpoint designed to help the cultists cross the deadly land. There, Gronag showed his cruel and sadistic traits by sending trained [[hyena]]s into the darkness after bones, where the hyenas were devoured by the curse.
